game.name: Pony Cooking Rainbow Cake
game.description:
Hey kids! Your wait is over now since the most fascinating and exciting free online game – Pony Cooking Rainbow Cake – is here to give you something bigger than you have imagined ever. This exclusively-designed cooking game from girls category will provide you a chance to try your best chef skills. In this cool online cooking game, your mission is to help the main character – Pony – prepare a delicious rainbow cake within the shortest time possible. Use your best cooking and time-management skills and try to complete all the tasks perfectly in order to earn a high score at the end of this cool game for girls.

The smell of this eye-catching and scrumptious dessert is awesome. Pony will be thankful to you if you help her to bake a cake in a way she actually wanted. In the first level of this flash game for kids, you have taken her to the supply store to buy all the ingredients required to prepare the mouth-watering cake. Once you are done, you can start cooking using the ingredients and tools available in the well-furnished kitchen. Your cake includes multiple layers which will show all the colors of rainbow. Do not worry! Pony is there is assist you. 

In the first level, you have to take Pony to a shopping store where you will find all the ingredients required to bake your cake. Your best score in this latest cooking game will help you reach on the podium where only the best of chefs stand. You can also try this cake recipe at your home after playing this flash game in your browser. Good luck to earn a higher score!
